dunes-script-module.name: getLogger
dunes-script-module.description: @param name - logger name; ex: com.vmware.pscoe.mail @param options - logger context, could be any object; ex: vc:VirtualMachine
dunes-script-module.script: var Logger = System.getModule("com.vmware.pscoe.library.logging").Logger(); return new Logger(name, options);
